**Admission Procedure:**
1. Fill online application form
2. Upload required documents (CNIC, transcripts, photos)
3. Pay admission fee
4. Appear in entry test
5. Check merit list and finalize enrollment
The entry test results will be uploaded on official university portal. You can login with admission ID to check.
Class schedules are available on Student Portal. Enrolled students can download schedule file from portal.
